mapper.select: {CALL OHR.P_DTM_APPL_CHECK( #{companyCd, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{localeCd, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empId, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{reasonCd, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staYmd, mode=IN, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endYmd, mode=IN, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hisOid, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{authType, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dtmType, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modUserId, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tzCd, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultCode, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultMsg, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )}
